body:
Hey all, just wanted to drop a quick post to let everyone know that I'm back after a years break. I was rightfully banned for being a prick and having loads on infractions. I would like to thank the staff for appealing my ban so that I can rejoin the wonderful Avicus community. It's gonna take a while for me to get back to the pvp standard that I was at when I left ;). 

P.S My former name was DaCrowMan
body_tagged:

title: I'm back :D

replies.body:
Hey man, it's good to see that you've acknowledged your mistakes and are a changed person - your efforts have been rewarded, my friend ;)

Go search up in the search bar of Avicus, "Atlas". We're getting a cool super META for Avicus that will severely improve Avicus' gameplay.

And also, connect to this IP to vote for Avicus: avic.us.like.mc.namemc.com

You can only like it once, we're #2 I believe :)

replies.body: Thanks for all the messages! I will certainly look at Atlas!

replies.body:
I remember you. I haven't talked to you much but I saw your forum posts and you seemed like a nice guy.

wb ;)

replies.body: Welcome back! I hope we get to know each other xD
